r.s: Fast and Safe little cache system
r.d: This package is a little cache system optimized for file containers. It is fast and safe (because it uses file locking and/or anti-corruption tests).
r.n: Bug fixed : - problem of non-ISO-8859-1 characters in package.xml (bug #3621) - problem of the returning value in clean() method (integer and not void) (thanks to Demian Turner (demian (at) phpkitchen (dot) com))
